Name: TubeSliderCoinCreator
Notes: A generator that creates Coins (TubeSliderCoinCreator) or Purple Coins (TubeSliderCoinCreatorPurple) and lays them out on a tube slide. The line can be straight, twisted or a sine wave. It needs to be linked to a proper TubeSlider instance.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Coins
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of Coins to be spawned. Default is 1.

Obj_arg1.Name: Edge Offset
Obj_arg1.Description: The offset from the tube's edge at which the Coins should be placed. Default is 0.

Obj_arg2.Name: Coin Spacing
Obj_arg2.Description: The distance between each Coin. Default is 500.

Obj_arg3.Name: Starting Angle
Obj_arg3.Description: The angle around the tube slide from which the Coins will be placed.

Obj_arg4.Name: Twist Angle / Sine Amplitude
Obj_arg4.Description: The amount of degrees it twists around counterclockwise. However, if Obj_arg5 is set, this specifies the sine wave's amplitude. Default is 0.

Obj_arg5.Name: Enable Sine Wave
Obj_arg5.Description: If set to 1, Obj_arg4 specifies the amplitude for sine wave placement. Default is 0.

Obj_arg6.Name: Sine Phase Shift
Obj_arg6.Description: The sine wave's phase shift in degrees. Default is 0. Requires Obj_arg5 to be set to 1.

Obj_arg7.Name: Sine Cycle Degrees
Obj_arg7.Description: The number of periods multiplied by 360. Default is 360, which corresponds to one full sine period. Requires Obj_arg5 to be set to 1.
